name: IPFUnpacker
tagline: IPFUnpacker decrypts IPF files in the KROBT client.
body:
# IPFUnpacker

### Usage : unpack.exe \<IPF file\>

Be careful when using it : it will **erase** the old IPF and use the same file for decrypting it, so make sure to backup your IPF files somewhere before decrypting them.

Once decrypted, the IPF is readable by traditional tools (such as IPF Suite).

![HowTo](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/8c5a19dc4c1ac63ee9f4abcb1a6c96eb144a7f79/687474703a2f2f692e696d6775722e636f6d2f364833703674352e676966)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
